name: Introduction to React Native
description: Learn the basics of React Native development and build your first mobile app.

syllabus.content: Overview of React Native, setting up your development environment.
Creating a simple mobile app using React Native components.
Learn how to manage state and props in React Native components.
Explore various UI components and styling options in React Native.

name: Mastering Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Explore fundamental data structures and algorithms used in modern software development.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of time and space complexity

syllabus.content: Arrays, Linked Lists, Stacks, Queues.
Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, Merge Sort, Quick Sort.
Linear Search, Binary Search.

name: Web Development with Python and Django
description: Build full-stack web applications using the popular Python web framework Django.

syllabus.content: Setting up your development environment, creating models and views.
Implementing user login, registration, and form handling.
Working with databases using Django's Object-Relational Mapper.

name: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Explore the basics of machine learning concepts and build simple ML models with Python.

syllabus.content: Supervised vs. Unsupervised Learning, Classification and Regression.
Building and evaluating linear regression models for prediction.
Classification algorithms for making predictions based on data.

name: Advanced Web Security
description: Dive deep into web security vulnerabilities and learn techniques for building secure applications.
prerequisites: Solid understanding of web development concepts

syllabus.content: Common vulnerabilities like SQL injection and XSS, secure coding practices.
Secure password storage, session management, access control mechanisms.
Best practices for securing APIs and protecting against unauthorized access.

name: Game Development with Unity
description: Bring your game ideas to life by learning the Unity game engine and C# programming.

syllabus.content: User interface, creating game objects, basic scripting with C#.
Building a simple 2D game with sprites, animation, and player controls.
Working with 3D models, physics, and camera controls.

name: UX/UI Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the core principles of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design to create user-centered products.
prerequisites: Interest in design and user experience
Basic understanding of visual design principles

syllabus.content: Design thinking, user research, information architecture.
Visual elements, layout principles, typography, and color theory.
User flows, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing.

name: Data Visualization with Tableau
description: Master the art of data visualization using the powerful Tableau software.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of data analysis concepts

syllabus.content: Getting started with the Tableau interface, connecting to data sources.
Building bar charts, line charts, pie charts, and more.
Creating interactive dashboards to communicate insights effectively.

name: Blockchain Fundamentals
description: Explore the revolutionary technology behind cryptocurrencies and decentralized applications (dApps).
prerequisites: Basic understanding of computer science concepts

syllabus.content: Distributed ledger technology, consensus mechanisms, key concepts.
Understanding how Bitcoin works, mining, and the future of digital currencies.
Building self-executing contracts on the blockchain, potential applications.

name: Creative Writing: Finding Your Voice
description: Develop your creative writing skills and explore different genres in a supportive environment.

syllabus.content: Freewriting exercises, character development, and exploring different genres.
Crafting plot, building suspense, and revising your work.
Exploring different poetic forms, writing personal essays, and finding your voice.
